original_text: The sons of Simeon according to their clans: of Nemuel, the clan of the Nemuelites; of Jamin, the clan of the Jaminites; of Jachin, the clan of the Jachinites;
korean_text: 시므온 자손의 종족들은 이러하니 느무엘에게서 난 느무엘 종족과 야민에게서 난 야민 종족과 야긴에게서 난 야긴 종족과

sentences.original_text: The sons of Simeon according to their clans:
of Nemuel, the clan of the Nemuelites;
of Jamin, the clan of the Jaminites;
of Jachin, the clan of the Jachinites;
